smooth.metal
Class SmoothLookAndFeel

    java.lang.Object
    javax.swing.LookAndFeel
    javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeel
    javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel
    smooth.metal.SmoothLookAndFeel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, SmoothLookAndFeel
public class SmoothLookAndFeel
extends MetalLookAndFeel
implements SmoothLookAndFeel

Smooth Metal Look And Feel. An enhanced version of the standard Metal Look And Feel by Sun Microsystems. This version uses the capabilities of the Java 2D API to create better looking, fully anti-aliased versions of the controls.

It is mainly intended as a technology demonstration and research project. The code is not optimized for speed or stability. Use it at your own risk.

Author:
Marcel Offermans
See Also:
